argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | tfrlem.1 | |- A = { f | E. x e. On ( f Fn x /\ A. y e. x ( f ` y ) = ( F ` ( f |` y ) ) ) } |
| 2 | 1 | #P_tfrlem13 | |- -. recs ( F ) e. _V |
| 3 | 1 | #P_tfrlem7 | |- Fun recs ( F ) |
| 4 |  | #P_funex | |- ( ( Fun recs ( F ) /\ dom recs ( F ) e. On ) -> recs ( F ) e. _V ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_mpan | |- ( dom recs ( F ) e. On -> recs ( F ) e. _V ) |
| 6 | 2, 5 | #P_mto | |- -. dom recs ( F ) e. On |
| 7 | 1 | #P_tfrlem8 | |- Ord dom recs ( F ) |
| 8 |  | #P_ordeleqon | |- ( Ord dom recs ( F ) <-> ( dom recs ( F ) e. On \/ dom recs ( F ) = On ) ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_mpbi | |- ( dom recs ( F ) e. On \/ dom recs ( F ) = On ) |
| 10 | 6, 9 | #P_mtpor | |- dom recs ( F ) = On |
